Stick OutRun Revision B ROMs in this directory.
They must be named as follows:

epr10187.88
epr10327a.76
epr10328a.75
epr10329a.58
epr10330a.57
epr10380b.133
epr10381a.132
epr10382b.118
epr10383b.117
mpr10371.9
mpr10372.13
mpr10373.10
mpr10374.14
mpr10375.11
mpr10376.15
mpr10377.12
mpr10378.16
opr10185.11
opr10186.47
opr10188.71
opr10189.70
opr10190.69
opr10191.68
opr10192.67
opr10193.66
opr10230.104

opr10268.99
